mapper.select: select * from (SELECT cardid, typename, cardicon, minprice, maxprice, xgocoin, starttime, endtime, commentstartdays, watchdays, commentcount, yield, forder, DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createtime, createid, DATE_FORMAT(updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as updatetime, updateid, case when STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),starttime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= now() AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),endtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') > now() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as isbuy, timestampdiff(SECOND,now(),STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),starttime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) as secondbuy FROM c_t_app_membercard) A order by isbuy, forder
